ComicInfo.Title: [Untitled]; What Is Ninja?
ComicInfo.Summary:
Behold the debut of the TMNT's weirdest foe yet: Wyrm! When Michelangelo tries to help find a missing person in the sewers, he ends up discovering something he wished stayed in the dark!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Reg | Regular Cover | Freddie E. Williams II | 1 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Nick Pitarra (a) & Felipe Sobreiro (c) | 2 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Ben Bishop | 3 | Note: The digital edition (1/11/2017) for this issue was released before the print edition.
